TopicTitle: Strut issue going to nowhere after reverting to vehicle assembly building.

Articles.Content: Hi the struts have an odd behavior now, a few of them start pointing to nowhere after I revert a rocket. I have had this happen 3 times now on this below rocket. 1.05 issue? (unless it is something else I did not notice before today) thanks.

Yep, this was in 1.0.4, actually it came to light when the radial/mirror symmetry toggle was added, and also the 90 degree rotation of the craft in the VAB (they used to face the doors).

Struts can freak out if placed on a rocket that is then rotated on its vertical axis, or was made in the SPH then moved, actually any radial part can, and this should be fixed in 1.1
